attributes.action: Stop America threatening citizens of Britain as targets to protect their Homeland security
attributes.additional_details: I have created this petition on behalf of everyone in the Uk.  I am worried that we are all under threat of America.  They seem to be taking on the whole world, in respect of cracking down on terrorism.  I think it is time for our government to hold America to account and stand up for our country.  Tell the Americans we British will not be Bullied and Threatened by America, We are not their enemy.
